title: Publishers leave the dead malls of Web 2.0
description: There’s nothing left for you in the dead malls of Web 2.0. The era of mass platform-based social media has ended, and any publication still chasing likes and clicks in 2026 is holding the bag. This means publications need to work harder than ever to define their identities and become destinations that readers remember to...
